short_summary: Environmental Impact Studies and Other Environmental Studies and Land Use Studies and Research and Writing
full_summary:
# Cancelled Government Tender Notice: Invitation to Bid for Environmental Impact Studies
## Notice Details

- **Notice Title**: Cancelled-5P420-22-0173/A
- **Notice Reference**: PW-23-01023741
- **Contracting Entity**: Parks Canada

### Tender Status

The invitation to bid has been **cancelled**.

### General Information

- **Solicitation Number**: 5P420-22-0173/A
- **Publication Date**: January 27, 2023
- **Cancellation Date**: February 23, 2023
- **Schedule**: N/A

### Service Description

Environmental Impact Studies, including Other Environmental Studies, Land Use Studies, and Research and Writing services are no longer being solicited.

### Commercial Information

- **Notice Type**: Request for Proposal (Demande de propositions)
- **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Selective tendering (Concurrentielle - Appel d'offres sélectif)
- **Trade Agreements**: Set-Aside Program for Aboriginal Business (SPAB) and Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

### Instructions

Please do not submit any applications.

### Contact Information

If you have any inquiries regarding this notice, please contact:

- Andrea McGraw-Alcock
- Phone: 587-436-5908
- Email: [andrea.mcgraw-alcock@pc.gc.ca](mailto:andrea.mcgraw-alcock@pc.gc.ca)
- National Contracting Services, Bid Fax: 1-866-246-6893, Bid E-mail Address: [soumissionsouest-bidswest@canada.ca](mailto:soumissionsouest-bidswest@canada.ca)
